airportsProject.gui

Class FlightDetailsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • airportsProject.gui.FlightDetailsController

  • public class FlightDetailsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Shows the route the flight will take among other infos like detailed informations for each connection, the duration (total and for connection) and the airplane used for the flight
